title: Cities of Life

ğŸŒ Digital Textures: Ep. #005ğŸŒ

ğŸ”¥ In this episode, we present Rico Imer, a DJ with a solid trajectory in the underground scene. With a refined style and flawless mixing, he blends Deep Tech, Minimal, Deep House, Tech House, and Progressive into a unique sonic journey. ğŸ¶âœ¨

ğŸ’¬ â€ â€˜Cities of Lifeâ€™ is inspired by that feeling of arriving in a new city at nightâ€”seeing the lights, the buildings, the people, and realizing that life is already in motion. title: Secret Locations Fiji Guest Mix
description:
ğŸŒ Digital Textures: Ep. #004 ğŸŒ

ğŸ”¥ The moment has arrived. Secret Locations Fiji presents their exclusive set for Digital Textures, a selection that reflects over two decades of passion for Progressive House.

ğŸ’¬ "It is an honor to contribute this exclusive mix for Digital Textures. We believe in the importance of collaborating with platforms and people who share our passion, spreading the love for electronic music around the world. For this session, we drew inspiration from the Argentinian talents Paul Deep, John Cosani, and Matias Chilano, artists we consider to be among the most *underrated* in the Progressive House scene.
We hope you enjoy this journey as much as we enjoyed creating it. Gracias, Thank You & Vinaka Vaka Levu!!!" â€” Secret Locations Fiji ğŸ¶âœ¨

title: SMN
description:
ğŸŒ Digital Textures: Ep. #003 ğŸŒ

ğŸ”¥ In our third episode, we dive into the unique style of JulietEko, taking us on a sonic journey exploring downtempo, deep house, progressive, and more. ğŸ¶âœ¨

His set, titled SMN, features a selection that plays with different speeds and rhythm changes. In his spare time, JulietEko blends diverse genres like rock 'n' roll, reggae, pop, and rap from the '70s, '80s, '90s, and 2000s, creating sets full of emotion, movement, and dynamic sensations. ğŸ¸ğŸ¤ğŸ§
